languages.text: "Ты отдал свою семью в когти чудовищной ереси, а теперь льешь слезы?" {n}Голос сенешаля звенит ледяным осуждением.{/n} "Полагаю, любые разговоры с тобой бессмысленны, Монтэг".

traits.locale_text: "Ты отдал свою семью в когти чудовищной ереси, а теперь льешь слезы?" {n}Голос сенешаля звенит ледяным осуждением.{/n} "Полагаю, любые разговоры с тобой бессмысленны, Монтэг".

languages.text: "First you consign your family to the clutches of unspeakable heresy, and now you weep for their deaths?" {n}The Seneschal's voice rings with icy castigation.{/n} "I see that any further dialogue with you would be pointless, Monteg."
languages.original_text: "Ты отдал свою семью в когти чудовищной ереси, а теперь льешь слезы?" {n}Голос сенешаля звенит ледяным осуждением.{/n} "Полагаю, любые разговоры с тобой бессмысленны, Монтэг".

traits.locale_text: "First you consign your family to the clutches of unspeakable heresy, and now you weep for their deaths?" {n}The Seneschal's voice rings with icy castigation.{/n} "I see that any further dialogue with you would be pointless, Monteg."

"First you consign your family to the clutches of unspeakable heresy, and now you weep for their deaths?" {n}The Seneschal's voice rings with icy castigation.{/n} "I see that any further dialogue with you would be pointless, Monteg."

"First you consign your family to the clutches of unspeakable heresy, and now you weep for their deaths?" {n}The Seneschal's voice rings with icy castigation.{/n} "I see that any further dialogue with you would be pointless, Monteg."

"First you consign your family to the clutches of unspeakable heresy, and now you weep for their deaths?" {n}The Seneschal's voice rings with icy castigation.{/n} "I see that any further dialogue with you would be pointless, Monteg."

"First you consign your family to the clutches of unspeakable heresy, and now you weep for their deaths?" {n}The Seneschal's voice rings with icy castigation.{/n} "I see that any further dialogue with you would be pointless, Monteg."

"First you consign your family to the clutches of unspeakable heresy, and now you weep for their deaths?" {n}The Seneschal's voice rings with icy castigation.{/n} "I see that any further dialogue with you would be pointless, Monteg."

"First you consign your family to the clutches of unspeakable heresy, and now you weep for their deaths?" {n}The Seneschal's voice rings with icy castigation.{/n} "I see that any further dialogue with you would be pointless, Monteg."

languages.text: «Primero envía a su familia a las garras de una herejía indescriptible, ¿y ahora llora por sus muertes?». {n}La voz del senescal no presenta ni un atisbo de sentimiento.{/n} «Veo que cualquier otra conversación con usted carecería de sentido, Monteg».
languages.original_text: "First you consign your family to the clutches of unspeakable heresy, and now you weep for their deaths?" {n}The Seneschal's voice rings with icy castigation.{/n} "I see that any further dialogue with you would be pointless, Monteg."

traits.locale_text: «Primero envía a su familia a las garras de una herejía indescriptible, ¿y ahora llora por sus muertes?». {n}La voz del senescal no presenta ni un atisbo de sentimiento.{/n} «Veo que cualquier otra conversación con usted carecería de sentido, Monteg».

languages.text: 「まず、自分の家族を言いようのない異端の魔の手に晒して、今度は彼らの死を悼んで泣くというのか？」{n}家令長の声が氷のような非難で響く。{/n}「これ以上会話しても無駄なようだ、モンテグ」
languages.original_text: "First you consign your family to the clutches of unspeakable heresy, and now you weep for their deaths?" {n}The Seneschal's voice rings with icy castigation.{/n} "I see that any further dialogue with you would be pointless, Monteg."

traits.locale_text: 「まず、自分の家族を言いようのない異端の魔の手に晒して、今度は彼らの死を悼んで泣くというのか？」{n}家令長の声が氷のような非難で響く。{/n}「これ以上会話しても無駄なようだ、モンテグ」

languages.text: “你亲手把你的家人推向了异端恶行的火坑，现在却又为她们的死而哭哭啼啼？”{n}阿贝拉德声音中满是冰冷的责难之意。{/n}“看得出来，继续和你进行谈下去已经没有意义了，蒙特格。”
languages.original_text: "First you consign your family to the clutches of unspeakable heresy, and now you weep for their deaths?" {n}The Seneschal's voice rings with icy castigation.{/n} "I see that any further dialogue with you would be pointless, Monteg."

traits.locale_text: “你亲手把你的家人推向了异端恶行的火坑，现在却又为她们的死而哭哭啼啼？”{n}阿贝拉德声音中满是冰冷的责难之意。{/n}“看得出来，继续和你进行谈下去已经没有意义了，蒙特格。”

languages.text: "Erst überlasst Ihr Eure Familie den Fängen einer unaussprechlichen Ketzerei und jetzt weint Ihr um sie?" {n}Der züchtigende Ton in der Stimme des Truchsess ist nicht zu überhören.{/n} "Ich denke, jedes weitere Gespräch mit Euch wäre sinnlos, Monteg."
languages.original_text: "First you consign your family to the clutches of unspeakable heresy, and now you weep for their deaths?" {n}The Seneschal's voice rings with icy castigation.{/n} "I see that any further dialogue with you would be pointless, Monteg."

traits.locale_text: "Erst überlasst Ihr Eure Familie den Fängen einer unaussprechlichen Ketzerei und jetzt weint Ihr um sie?" {n}Der züchtigende Ton in der Stimme des Truchsess ist nicht zu überhören.{/n} "Ich denke, jedes weitere Gespräch mit Euch wäre sinnlos, Monteg."

languages.text: « Vous avez vous-même livré les vôtres aux affres d'une inqualifiable hérésie, et maintenant, vous pleurez leur mort ? » {n}Une condamnation sans appel s'exprime à travers la voix glaciale du sénéchal.{/n} « De toute évidence, il serait vain de continuer à dialoguer avec vous, Monteg. »
languages.original_text: "First you consign your family to the clutches of unspeakable heresy, and now you weep for their deaths?" {n}The Seneschal's voice rings with icy castigation.{/n} "I see that any further dialogue with you would be pointless, Monteg."

traits.locale_text: « Vous avez vous-même livré les vôtres aux affres d'une inqualifiable hérésie, et maintenant, vous pleurez leur mort ? » {n}Une condamnation sans appel s'exprime à travers la voix glaciale du sénéchal.{/n} « De toute évidence, il serait vain de continuer à dialoguer avec vous, Monteg. »

languages.text: "Önce aileni tarifi imkânsız bir kâfirliğin pençelerine bıraktın, şimdi de ölümlerinin ardından gözyaşı mı döküyorsun?" {n}Seneşal'in sesi, kan donduran bir azarlamayla çınlıyor.{/n} "Seninle konuşmayı daha fazla uzatmanın bir manası olmadığını görüyorum Monteg."
languages.original_text: "First you consign your family to the clutches of unspeakable heresy, and now you weep for their deaths?" {n}The Seneschal's voice rings with icy castigation.{/n} "I see that any further dialogue with you would be pointless, Monteg."
